original: While the text, consisting entirely of the subtitles, is mostly harmless, the movie shows a brain, killer robots and guns
This will be a line-by-line translation of the subtitles of the movie
Sintel is a movie created as a result of the Blender open movie project "Mango" and is released under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 license.
[Thom] Look Celia, we have to follow our passions;
just want to be awesome in space.
[Celia] Why don't you just admit that
you're freaked out by my robot hand?
[Thom] I'm not freaked out by- it's...
I'm freaked out! I have nightmares
...by these giant robotic claws of death...
[Tech head] Robot's memory synced and locked!
[Thom] I heard you guys talking last night.
It's not my fault, you know.
Of course you're ready, you're a rockstar.
[Barley] We should have about ten minutes...
We're on in one! All systems go!
Go! Move your asses! Go go go!
I love it! Come on, go!
We have to follow our passions.
...and I just want to be awesome in space.
[Barley] Okay, they're coming. Two minutes left!
[Celia] Why don't you just admit that you're
freaked out by my robot hand?
There's a lesson to be learned from this.
